DOC.brief_summary: Needle-free jet injector provides an alternative for patients with diabetes treated by insulin. This study aimed at evaluating pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics (PK-PD) profiles of lispro administered by jet injector and conventional pen.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic and Pharmacodynamic Profile of Insulin Lispro Using Needle-Free Jet Injection Technology
DOC.detailed_description: This is a randomized, double-blind, double-dummy, crossover study. Eighteen healthy volunteers will be recruited. Lispro (0.2 units/kg) will be administered by jet injector or by conventional pen and a seven-hour euglycemic clamp test will be performed. PK-PD profiles of lispro will be calculated.
DOC.criteria: 1. The range of height should be 170±10cm. 2. The range of weight should be ±10%kg. 3. Liver and renal function should be normal. 4. Health subjects with no chronic diseases or medications. 1. Drug allergy, history of allergic disorders or allergies. 2. A history of liver or kidney disease. 3. Smoker, drinkers. 4. Subjects who participated in other drug trials within a month. 5. Subjects who used medication which is known to organ damage.
